mapper.sql: id AS "id" , product_id AS "productId" , store_code AS "storeCode" , sku_code AS "skuCode" , sku_name AS "skuName" , market_price AS "marketPrice" , sale_price AS "salePrice" , is_special AS "isSpecial" , width AS "width" , depth AS "depth" , heigh AS "heigh" , length_unit AS "lengthUnit" , weight AS "weight" , weight_unit AS "weightUnit" , SKU备注 AS "sku备注" , create_user_code AS "createUserCode" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_user_code AS "updateUserCode" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_user_code AS "deleteUserCode" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, product_id = #{productId}, store_code = #{storeCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, sku_name = #{skuName}, market_price = #{marketPrice}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, is_special = #{isSpecial}, width = #{width}, depth = #{depth}, heigh = #{heigh}, length_unit = #{lengthUnit}, weight = #{weight}, weight_unit = #{weightUnit}, SKU备注 = #{sku备注}, create_user_code = #{createUserCode}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_user_code = #{deleteUserCode}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_prd_sku ( id, product_id, store_code, sku_code, sku_name, market_price, sale_price, is_special, width, depth, heigh, length_unit, weight, weight_unit, SKU备注, create_user_code, create_date, update_user_code, update_date, delete_user_code, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{storeCode}, #{skuCode}, #{skuName}, #{marketPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{isSpecial}, #{width}, #{depth}, #{heigh}, #{lengthUnit}, #{weight}, #{weightUnit}, #{sku备注}, #{createUserCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteUserCode}, #{deleteDate} )
